snippet.title: Spiritle | Official Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Spiritle is a turn-based strategic battle digital board game. You incarnate a Spirit among the 4 elements: Nature, Earth, Water and Fire. At the rhythm of the seasons, 4 players and Spirits challenge each other to regain their place in the World Tree. 
For more details about Spiritle and its progress, add to your Wishlist now. https://store.steampowered.com/app/1493260/Spiritle/
https://discord.gg/gg8NcFSBUK
https://fabledgame.com/spiritle
